title: Person of Interest - Elias is still alive (05x05)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: Love the music and framing here, it's utterly brilliant how they reveal him- like a supervillain or an Emperor still on his throne, and yet ever more awesome.

There’s a new player out there an adversary that we can’t beat & one we best not try and fight (Samaritan)

Elias is smart. He didn’t know who Samaritan was/is but he knew how dangerous his unknown enemy Samaritan was.
This all proves to you that even though Samaritan was an Invisible Entity it's might is a Force Beyond Reckoned With. I still wonder if he'd have turned on humanity in the near future.
I don't think I have ever cheered so much when I found out a villain was still alive than I did when they revealed Elias survived. I love him so much and this reveal was amazing!
Samaritan might be scary but if Harold had not crippled The Machine, Samaritan would've no chance
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 5
